original_title: Kentucky judge allegedly ran sexual favors scheme before sheriff killed him | Fox News
article_summary: Sheriff Mickey Stines is accused of fatally shooting Judge Kevin Mullins in Kentucky, following reports of a phone exchange between them and allegations of Mullins soliciting sexual favors in exchange for leniency. An accuser, Tya Adams, claims she was coerced into attending sex parties for Mullins and his friends in exchange for favors.</s>
